text: Psalm 145
A Song of God’s Majesty and Love
A praise of David.\f + \fr Ps 145 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
I will exalt you, my God, O king,
and I will bless\f + \fr 145:1 \ft That is, praise; here and v. \xt 2 \ft \f* your name forever and ever.
Every day I will bless you
and praise your name forever and ever.
Great \add is\add* Yahweh, and very worthy of praise,
and his greatness is unsearchable.
One generation will laud your works to another,
and will declare your mighty deeds.
On the splendor of the glory of your majesty,
and on your wonderful deeds, I will meditate.
And they will speak of the power of your awesome deeds,\f + \fr 145:6 \ft That is, deeds that evoke a fearful reverence \f*
and I will tell of your greatness.\f + \fr 145:6 \ft According to the reading tradition (\fqa Qere \ft ) \f*
They will utter \f + \fr 145:7 \ft Hebrew “pour forth” \f* the renown of your abundant goodness,
and they will proclaim with joy your righteousness.
Yahweh \add is\add* gracious and compassionate,
⸤slow to anger⸥\f + \fr 145:8 \ft Literally “long of nostrils” \f* and great in loyal love.
Yahweh \add is\add* good to all,
and his mercies \add are\add* over all his works.
All your works will praise you, O Yahweh,
and your faithful ones will bless\f + \fr 145:10 \ft That is, praise \f* you.
They will speak of the glory of your kingdom,
and talk of your power,
to make known to the children of humankind his mighty deeds,
and the glory of the majesty of his kingdom.
Your kingdom \add is\add* an everlasting kingdom,
and your dominion \add endures\add* ⸤throughout all generations⸥.\f + \fr 145:13 \ft Literally “for a generation and a generation” \f*
Yahweh upholds all who are falling,
and raises up all who are bowed down.
\add The\add* eyes of all look hopefully to you,
and you give them their food in due time,
opening your hand,
and satisfying \add the\add* desire \add of\add* every living creature.
Yahweh \add is\add* righteous in all his ways,
and loyal in all his works.
Yahweh \add is\add* near to all who call on him,
to all who call on him in truth.
He fulfills the desire of those who fear him;
he also hears their cry for help, and saves them.
Yahweh protects all those who love him,
but all the wicked he will exterminate.
My mouth will speak the praise of Yahweh,
and all flesh will bless his holy name
forever and ever.
